strategy: Deathwatch armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: Deathwatch Detachments have an Initiative of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on Ordo Xenos with Deathwatch allies

formations.name: 0-1 Officio Assassinorum
formations.units: Once per battle, during an Assault that the Deathwatch player initiated, a single unit anywhere in the enemy formation(s) is hit with D3 hits. These hits counts as being from CC, and have the 'Sniper' and 'First Strike' special rules. Any damage caused by these hits counts towards combat resolution.

formations.name: Deathwatch Kill-Team
extraUnits: Replace one Deathwatch Tacticals with one Deathwatch Black Shields: 25 points

sections.name: Deathwatch Support Detachments
sections.description: Two Deathwatch Support Detachment may be taken per Deathwatch Core Detachment

formations.name: Deathwatch Attack
formations.units: Three Deathwatch Land Speeders, three Assault Bikes

sections.name: Ordo Xenos Formations
sections.description: Two Ordo Xenos Formations may be taken per Deathwatch Core Detachment

formations.name: 0-1 Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Retinue
formations.units: One Ordo Xenos Inquisitor, three Ordo Xenos Acolytes, four Vendettas

formations.name: Motorized Planetary Defense Force Platoon
formations.units: Six PDF Conscripts, three Land Transporters

sections.name: Deathwatch Navy Detachments
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Deathwatch Navy Detachments

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Add enough Deathwatch Land Raiders or Land Raider Crusaders to transport the formation with no space left over

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add a Captain, Chaplain or Librarian

options.description: Replace a Captain in the army with a Watch Commander (Death Watch Detachments only. May not be combined with the 'Commander' upgrade)
Replace the Ordo Xenos Inquisitor with an Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Lord (Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Retinue only)
